thread.title: 'The Martian' lands with $55 million debut - KIMA
thread.title_full: 'The Martian' lands with $55 million debut - KIMA - Discussion on Topix

author: topix.com
title: 'The Martian' lands with $55 million debut - KIMA
text:
There are 1 comment on the KIMA story from 12 hrs ago, titled 'The Martian' lands with $55 million debut . In it, KIMA reports that:
Ridley Scott's 3-D space epic "The Martian" touched down in theaters with a robust $55 million at the weekend box office. The 20th Century Fox release, starring Matt Damon as an astronaut left for dead on Mars, proved moviegoers remain drawn by the gravitational pull of space adventures.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at KIMA.
